author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-2413. TaskTracker should handle disk failures by reinitializing
itself. (Ravi Gummadi and Jagane Sundar via omalley)

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3042: When a filter or consumer added Attributes to a TokenStream chain after it was already (partly) consumed [or clearAttributes(), captureState(), cloneAttributes(),... was called by the Tokenizer], the Tokenizer calling clearAttributes() or capturing state after addition may not do this on the newly added Attribute
